--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FILE: convert_to_text.py
SIZE: 1,208 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-14 17:42:12
================================================================================

import os

# Source folder
source_folder = r"K:\Properties4CreationVersions\p4c multi page\txt_exports\codeReview"
# Destination folder for .txt files
output_folder = os.path.join(source_folder, "txt_exports")
os.makedirs(output_folder, exist_ok=True)

# File extensions to convert
extensions = [".html", ".json", ".js", ".css", ".md"]

for root, dirs, files in os.walk(source_folder):
    for file in files:
        if any(file.endswith(ext) for ext in extensions):
            file_path = os.path.join(root, file)
            try:
                with open(file_path, "r", encoding="utf-8", errors="ignore") as f:
                    content = f.read()
                # Create .txt file with same name
                txt_name = file.replace(".", "_") + ".txt"
                txt_path = os.path.join(output_folder, txt_name)
                with open(txt_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as txt_file:
                    txt_file.write(content)
                print(f"Converted: {file_path} -> {txt_path}")
            except Exception as e:
                print(f"Error converting {file_path}: {e}")

print("✅ Conversion complete! All .txt files saved in:", output_folder)


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FILE: convert_to_text_enhanced.py
SIZE: 14,263 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-15 06:19:07
================================================================================
#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Enhanced File Converter - Single File Output with Directory Exclusion
Converts source code files to append to a single .txt format file.

Features:
- Excludes node_modules and codeReview directories during scanning
- Outputs everything to one single text file (append mode)
- Command-line configurable source folder and output file
- Progress tracking with detailed output
- Enhanced error handling and reporting
- Configurable file extensions
- Statistics and summary reporting
- Windows-compatible (no emoji characters)
"""

import os
import sys
import argparse
from datetime import datetime
from pathlib import Path


class SingleFileConverter:
    """Enhanced file converter with single file append output."""
    
    def __init__(self, source_folder, output_file, extensions=None, exclude_extensions=None):
        self.source_folder = Path(source_folder)
        self.output_file = Path(output_file)
        self.extensions = extensions or [".html", ".json", ".js", ".css", ".md", ".njk", ".txt", ".py", ".yml", ".yaml"]
        self.exclude_extensions = exclude_extensions or [".png", ".jpg", ".jpeg", ".gif", ".svg", ".mp4", ".webm", ".ico", ".woff", ".woff2"]
        self.exclude_directories = ["node_modules", "codeReview"]
        self.skipped_files = []
        self.error_files = []
        self.stats = {
            'total_files': 0,
            'converted': 0,
            'skipped': 0,
            'errors': 0,
            'total_chars': 0,
            'total_lines': 0
        }
        
    def should_convert_file(self, file_path):
        """Determine if a file should be converted."""
        # Check if file extension matches conversion criteria
        file_ext = file_path.suffix.lower()

        # Skip binary files
        if file_ext in self.exclude_extensions:
            return False, "binary file"

        # Skip if extension not in conversion list
        if file_ext not in self.extensions:
            return False, "unsupported extension"

        return True, None

    def generate_project_tree(self):
        """Generate a text-based project tree excluding specified directories."""
        tree_lines = []

        def add_tree(path, prefix=""):
            try:
                items = sorted(os.listdir(path))
            except PermissionError:
                return

            filtered_items = []
            for item in items:
                full_path = os.path.join(path, item)
                if os.path.isdir(full_path) and item in self.exclude_directories:
                    continue
                filtered_items.append(item)

            for i, item in enumerate(filtered_items):
                full_path = os.path.join(path, item)
                is_last = (i == len(filtered_items) - 1)
                connector = "└── " if is_last else "├── "
                tree_lines.append(prefix + connector + item)

                if os.path.isdir(full_path):
                    extension = "    " if is_last else "│   "
                    add_tree(full_path, prefix + extension)

        tree_lines.append(".")
        add_tree(str(self.source_folder))
        return "\n".join(tree_lines)
        
    def format_file_separator(self, file_path, is_first=False):
        """Create a formatted file separator."""
        relative_path = file_path.relative_to(self.source_folder)
        separator = []
        
        if is_first:
            separator.append("=" * 80)
        else:
            separator.append("-" * 80)
            
        separator.append(f"FILE: {relative_path}")
        separator.append(f"SIZE: {file_path.stat().st_size:,} bytes")
        separator.append(f"MODIFIED: {datetime.fromtimestamp(file_path.stat().st_mtime).strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}")
        separator.append("=" * 80)
        
        return '\n'.join(separator)
        
    def convert_and_append_file(self, file_path, is_first=False):
        """Convert a single file and append to the output file."""
        try:
            # Read file content with proper encoding handling
            try:
                with open(file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                    content = f.read()
            except UnicodeDecodeError:
                # Try with different encoding if UTF-8 fails
                with open(file_path, 'r', encoding='latin-1') as f:
                    content = f.read()
                    
            if not content.strip():
                return False, "empty file"
                
            # Calculate stats
            lines = len(content.splitlines())
            chars = len(content)
            
            # Append to single output file
            with open(self.output_file, 'a', encoding='utf-8') as output:
                # Add file separator
                separator = self.format_file_separator(file_path, is_first)
                output.write(separator)
                output.write('\n')
                
                # Add file content
                output.write(content)
                output.write('\n\n')
                
            # Update stats
            self.stats['converted'] += 1
            self.stats['total_chars'] += chars
            self.stats['total_lines'] += lines
            
            return True, f"converted ({lines} lines, {chars} chars)"
            
        except Exception as e:
            self.stats['errors'] += 1
            error_msg = f"error: {str(e)}"
            self.error_files.append({'file': str(file_path), 'error': error_msg})
            return False, error_msg
            
    def process_files(self):
        """Process all files in the source directory, excluding specified directories."""
        print(f"[SEARCH] Scanning source folder: {self.source_folder}")
        print(f"[EXCLUDE] Skipping directories: {', '.join(self.exclude_directories)}")
        print(f"[FILE] Looking for extensions: {', '.join(self.extensions)}")
        print(f"[SKIP] Excluding: {', '.join(self.exclude_extensions)}")
        print(f"[OUTPUT] Single file mode: {self.output_file}")
        print("-" * 60)
        
        # Clear the output file at start
        self.output_file.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
        with open(self.output_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
            f.write(f"CONSOLIDATED PROJECT FILES\n")
            f.write(f"Generated: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
            f.write(f"Source: {self.source_folder}\n")
            f.write(f"Output: {self.output_file}\n")
            f.write("=" * 80 + "\n\n")

            # Generate and append project tree
            project_tree = self.generate_project_tree()
            f.write("PROJECT TREE:\n")
            f.write(project_tree)
            f.write("\n\n" + "=" * 80 + "\n\n")
        
        # Get all files for processing (excluding specified directories)
        all_files = []
        for root, dirs, files in os.walk(self.source_folder):
            # Remove excluded directories from dirs to prevent walking into them
            dirs[:] = [d for d in dirs if d not in self.exclude_directories]
            
            root_path = Path(root)
            for file in files:
                file_path = root_path / file
                all_files.append(file_path)
        
        # Sort files for consistent ordering
        all_files.sort(key=lambda x: x.relative_to(self.source_folder))
        
        # Process each file
        for i, file_path in enumerate(all_files):
            self.stats['total_files'] += 1
            
            # Check if file should be converted
            should_convert, reason = self.should_convert_file(file_path)
            
            if should_convert:
                is_first = (self.stats['converted'] == 0)
                success, message = self.convert_and_append_file(file_path, is_first)
                if success:
                    print(f"[OK] {file_path.relative_to(self.source_folder)} -> {message}")
                else:
                    print(f"[FAIL] {file_path.relative_to(self.source_folder)} -> {message}")
                    self.skipped_files.append(str(file_path))
            else:
                print(f"[SKIP] {file_path.relative_to(self.source_folder)} -> skipped ({reason})")
                self.stats['skipped'] += 1
                self.skipped_files.append(str(file_path))
                
    def generate_summary_report(self):
        """Generate detailed conversion summary."""
        report_lines = []
        report_lines.append("=" * 80)
        report_lines.append("FILE CONVERSION SUMMARY REPORT")
        report_lines.append("=" * 80)
        report_lines.append(f"Generated: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}")
        report_lines.append(f"Source folder: {self.source_folder}")
        report_lines.append(f"Output file: {self.output_file}")
        report_lines.append(f"Excluded directories: {', '.join(self.exclude_directories)}")
        report_lines.append("")
        
        # Statistics
        report_lines.append("STATISTICS:")
        report_lines.append("-" * 40)
        report_lines.append(f"Total files scanned: {self.stats['total_files']}")
        report_lines.append(f"Files converted: {self.stats['converted']}")
        report_lines.append(f"Files skipped: {self.stats['skipped']}")
        report_lines.append(f"Errors: {self.stats['errors']}")
        report_lines.append(f"Total characters: {self.stats['total_chars']:,}")
        report_lines.append(f"Total lines: {self.stats['total_lines']:,}")
        report_lines.append("")
        
        # Skipped files
        if self.skipped_files:
            report_lines.append("SKIPPED FILES:")
            report_lines.append("-" * 40)
            for file_path in self.skipped_files:
                rel_path = Path(file_path).relative_to(self.source_folder)
                report_lines.append(f"{rel_path}")
            report_lines.append("")
            
        # Error files
        if self.error_files:
            report_lines.append("ERROR FILES:")
            report_lines.append("-" * 40)
            for error_info in self.error_files:
                rel_path = Path(error_info['file']).relative_to(self.source_folder)
                report_lines.append(f"{rel_path}: {error_info['error']}")
            report_lines.append("")
            
        report_lines.append("=" * 80)
        
        # Save summary report
        summary_path = self.output_file.parent / "conversion_summary.txt"
        with open(summary_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
            f.write('\n'.join(report_lines))
            
        return summary_path, '\n'.join(report_lines)
        
    def run(self):
        """Execute the conversion process."""
        print("[START] Starting single-file conversion process")
        print("=" * 60)
        
        try:
            # Validate source folder
            if not self.source_folder.exists():
                print(f"[ERROR] Source folder does not exist: {self.source_folder}")
                return False
                
            # Process files
            self.process_files()
            
            # Generate summary report
            summary_path, summary_content = self.generate_summary_report()
            
            # Print summary
            print("\n" + "=" * 60)
            print("[SUCCESS] CONVERSION COMPLETED SUCCESSFULLY!")
            print("=" * 60)
            print(f"[STATS] Summary:")
            print(f"   * Files converted: {self.stats['converted']}")
            print(f"   * Files skipped: {self.stats['skipped']}")
            print(f"   * Errors: {self.stats['errors']}")
            print(f"   * Total characters: {self.stats['total_chars']:,}")
            print(f"   * Total lines: {self.stats['total_lines']:,}")
            print(f"\n[FILE] Single output file: {self.output_file}")
            print(f"[SUMMARY] Report: {summary_path}")
            
            return True
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"[ERROR] Fatal error during conversion: {e}")
            return False


def main():
    """Main function with command-line argument parsing."""
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(
        description="Convert source code files to single .txt file (append mode).",
        formatter_class=argparse.RawDescriptionHelpFormatter,
        epilog="""
Examples:
  python convert_to_text_enhanced.py
  python convert_to_text_enhanced.py --source ./src --output ./all_code.txt
  python convert_to_text_enhanced.py --extensions .html,.js,.css --exclude .png,.jpg
        """
    )
    
    parser.add_argument(
        '--source', 
        default='.',
        help='Source folder to scan (default: current directory)'
    )
    
    parser.add_argument(
        '--output',
        default='consolidated_output.txt',
        help='Output file for all converted content (default: consolidated_output.txt)'
    )
    
    parser.add_argument(
        '--extensions',
        help='Comma-separated list of file extensions to convert (e.g., .html,.js,.css)'
    )
    
    parser.add_argument(
        '--exclude',
        help='Comma-separated list of file extensions to exclude (e.g., .png,.jpg,.gif)'
    )
    
    args = parser.parse_args()
    
    # Process extensions
    extensions = None
    if args.extensions:
        extensions = [ext.strip() for ext in args.extensions.split(',')]
        
    exclude_extensions = None
    if args.exclude:
        exclude_extensions = [ext.strip() for ext in args.exclude.split(',')]
    
    # Create converter and run
    converter = SingleFileConverter(
        source_folder=args.source,
        output_file=args.output,
        extensions=extensions,
        exclude_extensions=exclude_extensions
    )
    
    success = converter.run()
    sys.exit(0 if success else 1)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

                    <p class="veteran-badge"><i data-lucide="award"></i> Veteran-Owned & Operated</p>

    <script src="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest/dist/umd/lucide.js" integrity="sha384-sha384-XcPm71GSOvViJoCA7WCb/9rSD/M3VBABxIZH30y7wbDtwRymtm2Dw2NTumuGrJqB" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    <script>
        lucide.createIcons();
    </script>
    <script src="public/js/main.js"></script>

    <script>
        // 404 PAGE ENHANCEMENTS
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            // Add hover effects to link cards
            const linkCards = document.querySelectorAll('.link-card');
            linkCards.forEach(card => {
                card.addEventListener('mouseenter', function() {
                    this.style.transform = 'translateY(-5px)';
                    this.style.boxShadow = '0 8px 20px rgba(11, 17, 32, 0.15)';
                });
                
                card.addEventListener('mouseleave', function() {
                    this.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                    this.style.boxShadow = '0 2px 8px rgba(11, 17, 32, 0.1)';
                });
            });

            // Track 404 errors (if analytics is set up)
            if (window.gtag) {
                gtag('event', 'page_not_found', {
                    page_location: window.location.href,
                    page_referrer: document.referrer
                });
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

        <!-- MISSION SECTION -->
        <section class="mission-section">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="mission-content">
                    <div class="mission-text">
                        <h2>Our Mission</h2>
                        <p>Properties 4 Creations exists to honor the service of veterans and families by providing premium, renovated housing that serves as the foundation for rebuilding lives and strengthening communities across East Texas.</p>
                        
                        <p>Founded and operated by veterans, we understand the unique challenges our fellow service members face when transitioning to civilian life. Stable, quality housing isn't just a need—it's a stepping stone to success.</p>
                        
                        <div class="mission-values">
                            <div class="value-card">
                                <h3><i data-lucide="shield"></i> Honor</h3>
                                <p>We honor the service of veterans and their families through our commitment to excellence.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="value-card">
                                <h3><i data-lucide="heart"></i> Compassion</h3>
                                <p>We approach every family with dignity, respect, and understanding.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="value-card">
                                <h3><i data-lucide="award"></i> Excellence</h3>
                                <p>We set the highest standards for renovation quality and service delivery.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- STORY SECTION -->
        <section class="story-section">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="story-content">
                    <h2>Our Story</h2>
                    <div class="story-timeline">
                        <div class="timeline-item">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2020</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>The Beginning</h3>
                                <p>After witnessing too many veterans struggling with housing stability, our founder decided to take action. Properties 4 Creations was established with a single mission: provide quality housing for those who served.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="timeline-item">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2021</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>First Renovations</h3>
                                <p>We purchased and renovated our first property in Tyler, Texas. Every home had to meet our rigorous standards - no shortcuts, no compromises. The first family moved in just before Christmas.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="timeline-item">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2022</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>Growth & Partnerships</h3>
                                <p>We partnered with the VA and local housing authorities to become HUD-VASH and Section 8 certified. Our reputation for quality and veteran-focused service began to grow across East Texas.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="timeline-item">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2023</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>Community Impact</h3>
                                <p>As we expanded to Longview and surrounding areas, we began to see the ripple effect: families stabilized, children thriving in school, veterans finding their footing. This became more than a business - it became a calling.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="timeline-item">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2024</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>Transparency & Standards</h3>
                                <p>We made a commitment to transparency, publishing our renovation standards and cost breakdowns. If we're going to do this, we do it right - no hiding, no cutting corners.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="timeline-item">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2025</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>Today & Beyond</h3>
                                <p>Today, we've housed over 20 veterans and families, renovated 25+ properties, and maintained a 100% voucher acceptance rate. But our journey is just beginning. Every home we create is a chance to rebuild a life.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- TEAM SECTION -->

                <p>&copy; 2025 Properties 4 Creations. All rights reserved.</p>

            </div>
        </div>

    <!-- SCRIPTS -->
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest/dist/umd/lucide.js" integrity="sha384-sha384-XcPm71GSOvViJoCA7WCb/9rSD/M3VBABxIZH30y7wbDtwRymtm2Dw2NTumuGrJqB" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    <script>
        lucide.createIcons();
    </script>
    <script src="public/js/main.js"></script>

    <script>
        // APPLICATION FORM JAVASCRIPT
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const form = document.getElementById('application-form');
            const successMessage = document.getElementById('success-message');
            const applicantType = document.getElementById('applicant-type');
            const militaryGroup = document.getElementById('military-service-group');

            // Show/hide military service field based on applicant type
            applicantType.addEventListener('change', function() {
                if (this.value === 'veteran' || this.value === 'spouse') {
                    militaryGroup.style.display = 'block';
                    document.getElementById('military-service').required = true;
                } else {
                    militaryGroup.style.display = 'none';
                    document.getElementById('military-service').required = false;
                }
            });

            form.addEventListener('submit', function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();

                let isValid = true;
                const formGroups = form.querySelectorAll('.form-group');

                formGroups.forEach(group => {
                    const input = group.querySelector('input, select, textarea');
                    if (!input) return;

                    group.classList.remove('error');

                    if (input.required && !input.value.trim()) {
                        group.classList.add('error');
                        isValid = false;
                    } else if (input.type === 'email' && input.value && !/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(input.value)) {
                        group.classList.add('error');
                        isValid = false;
                    } else if (input.type === 'tel' && input.value && !/^[0-9\-\+\(\)\s]+$/.test(input.value)) {
                        group.classList.add('error');
                        isValid = false;
                    } else if (input.type === 'checkbox' && !input.checked) {
                        group.classList.add('error');
                        isValid = false;
                    }
                });

                if (isValid) {
                    console.log('Form submitted:', new FormData(form));
                    successMessage.style.display = 'block';
                    form.style.display = 'none';

                    // Reset form after 5 seconds
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        form.reset();
                        form.style.display = 'block';
                        successMessage.style.display = 'none';
                    }, 5000);
                }
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

<!-- ============================================
     BUTTON USAGE EXAMPLES
     ============================================ -->

<!-- Basic Button Examples -->
<button class="btn btn-primary">Primary Button</button>
<button class="btn btn-secondary">Secondary Button</button>
<button class="btn btn-outline">Outline Button</button>
<button class="btn btn-ghost">Ghost Button</button>

<!-- State Buttons -->
<button class="btn btn-success">Success</button>
<button class="btn btn-danger">Delete</button>
<button class="btn btn-warning">Warning</button>

<!-- Size Variants -->
<button class="btn btn-primary btn-xs">Extra Small</button>
<button class="btn btn-primary btn-sm">Small</button>
<button class="btn btn-primary">Default</button>
<button class="btn btn-primary btn-lg">Large</button>
<button class="btn btn-primary btn-xl">Extra Large</button>

<!-- Icon Buttons -->
<button class="btn btn-primary">
  <i data-lucide="home" class="icon icon-left"></i>
  Home
</button>

<button class="btn btn-primary">
  Next
  <i data-lucide="arrow-right" class="icon icon-right"></i>
</button>

<button class="btn btn-primary btn-icon" aria-label="Search">
  <i data-lucide="search"></i>
</button>

<!-- Loading State (JavaScript controlled) -->
<button class="btn btn-primary" id="submit-btn">Submit</button>
<script>
  // Set loading state
  ButtonUtils.setLoading('#submit-btn', 'Processing...');

  // Remove loading state after operation
  setTimeout(() => {
    ButtonUtils.removeLoading('#submit-btn', 'Success!');
  }, 2000);
</script>

<!-- Disabled State -->
<button class="btn btn-primary" disabled>Disabled Button</button>

<!-- Button Group -->
<div class="btn-group" role="group" aria-label="View options">
  <button class="btn btn-outline active" aria-pressed="true">List</button>
  <button class="btn btn-outline" aria-pressed="false">Grid</button>
  <button class="btn btn-outline" aria-pressed="false">Map</button>
</div>

<!-- Full Width Button -->
<button class="btn btn-primary btn-block">Full Width Button</button>

<!-- Copy to Clipboard Button -->
<button class="btn btn-secondary" data-copy="Text to copy">
  <i data-lucide="copy" class="icon icon-left"></i>
  Copy Code
</button>

<!-- Confirmation Button (Destructive) -->
<button class="btn btn-danger" id="delete-btn">Delete Property</button>
<script>
  ButtonUtils.addConfirmation(
    '#delete-btn',
    'Are you sure?',
    function() {
      // Delete operation here
      console.log('Property deleted');
    }
  );
</script>

<!-- Form Submit Button -->
<form action="/apply" method="POST">
  <input type="email" name="email" required>
  <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg">
    Submit Application
  </button>
</form>

<!-- Link styled as Button -->
<a href="/properties" class="btn btn-primary">Browse Properties</a>

<!-- Context-aware Buttons -->
<div style="background: #0B1120; padding: 2rem;">
  <button class="btn btn-secondary on-dark">On Dark Background</button>
  <button class="btn btn-ghost on-dark">Ghost on Dark</button>
</div>

                                <input type="email" id="contact-email" name="contactEmail" required>
                                <span class="error-message">Valid email is required</span>
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="contact-phone">Phone Number</label>
                                <input type="tel" id="contact-phone" name="contactPhone" pattern="[0-9\-\+\(\)\s]+">
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="contact-subject">Subject *</label>
                                <select id="contact-subject" name="contactSubject" required>
                                    <option value="">-- Select a subject --</option>
                                    <option value="inquiry">General Inquiry</option>
                                    <option value="application">Application Help</option>
                                    <option value="property">Specific Property</option>
                                    <option value="programs">Housing Programs</option>
                                    <option value="feedback">Feedback</option>
                                    <option value="other">Other</option>
                                </select>
                                <span class="error-message">Please select a subject</span>
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="contact-message">Message *</label>
                                <textarea id="contact-message" name="contactMessage" rows="6" required placeholder="Please describe your housing needs and how we can help you..."></textarea>
                                <span class="error-message">Message is required</span>
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <div class="checkbox-group">
                                    <input type="checkbox" id="agree-contact-privacy" name="agreeContactPrivacy" required>
                                    <label for="agree-contact-privacy" style="margin: 0;">I agree to the Privacy Policy and understand my information will be used to help with housing assistance *</label>
                                </div>
                                <span class="error-message">You must agree to continue</span>
                            </div>

                            <button type="submit" class="submit-btn">Send Message</button>
                        </form>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>
    </main>

/**
 * Button Component - Properties 4 Creations
 * Enterprise-grade button system with variants, sizes, and states
 */

/* ========================================
   Base Button
   ======================================== */

.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: var(--spacing-2);
  padding: var(--spacing-3) var(--spacing-6);
  border: 2px solid transparent;
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  font-family: var(--font-family-sans);
  font-size: var(--font-size-base);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
  line-height: 1.5;
  text-decoration: none;
  text-align: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all var(--duration-base) var(--easing-ease-out);
  user-select: none;
  white-space: nowrap;
  
  /* Ensure 44x44px touch target (WCAG) */
  min-height: 44px;
  min-width: 44px;
  
  /* Prevent layout shift */
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.btn:focus-visible {
  outline: 3px solid var(--color-primary-gold);
  outline-offset: 4px;
}

.btn:disabled,
.btn[aria-disabled="true"] {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  pointer-events: none;
}

/* ========================================
   Button Variants
   ======================================== */

/* Primary Button */
.btn-primary {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-gold), var(--color-primary-gold-light));
  color: var(--color-primary-navy);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-gold);
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  background: var(--color-primary-gold-light);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
}

.btn-primary:active {
  transform: translateY(0);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
}

/* Secondary Button */
.btn-secondary {
  background: transparent;
  color: var(--color-primary-navy);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-navy);
}

.btn-secondary:hover {
  background: var(--color-primary-navy);
  color: var(--color-neutral-white);
}

.btn-secondary:active {
  background: var(--color-primary-navy-dark);
}

/* Tertiary Button (Ghost) */
.btn-tertiary {
  background: transparent;
  color: var(--color-primary-gold);
  border-color: transparent;
}

.btn-tertiary:hover {
  background: rgba(194, 142, 90, 0.1);
}

.btn-tertiary:active {
  background: rgba(194, 142, 90, 0.2);
}

/* Danger Button */
.btn-danger {
  background: var(--color-semantic-error);
  color: var(--color-neutral-white);
  border-color: var(--color-semantic-error);
}

.btn-danger:hover {
  background: #b71c1c;
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(211, 47, 47, 0.4);
}

/* Success Button */
.btn-success {
  background: var(--color-semantic-success);
  color: var(--color-neutral-white);
  border-color: var(--color-semantic-success);
}

.btn-success:hover {
  background: #2e7d32;
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(56, 142, 60, 0.4);
}

/* Outline Variants */
.btn-outline-primary {
  background: transparent;
  color: var(--color-primary-gold);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-gold);
}

.btn-outline-primary:hover {
  background: var(--color-primary-gold);
  color: var(--color-primary-navy);
}

/* ========================================
   Button Sizes
   ======================================== */

.btn-sm {
  padding: var(--spacing-2) var(--spacing-4);
  font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
  min-height: 36px;
}

  padding: var(--spacing-4) var(--spacing-8);

  min-height: 52px;
}

  padding: var(--spacing-5) var(--spacing-10);
  font-size: var(--font-size-xl);
  min-height: 60px;
}

.btn-full-width {
  width: 100%;
}

/* ========================================
   Button States
   ======================================== */

/* Loading State */
.btn-loading {
  position: relative;
  color: transparent;
  pointer-events: none;
}

.btn-loading::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  margin: -10px 0 0 -10px;
  border: 3px solid currentColor;
  border-radius: 50%;

  animation: btn-spin 0.6s linear infinite;
}

  border-color: var(--color-primary-navy);
  border-top-color: transparent;
}

@keyframes btn-spin {
  to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

/* ========================================
   Ripple Effect (Material Design)
   ======================================== */

.btn-ripple {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.btn-ripple::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  width: 0;
  height: 0;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-radius: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  transition: width 0.6s ease-out, height 0.6s ease-out;
}

.btn-ripple:active::before {
  width: 300px;
  height: 300px;
}

/* ========================================
   Icon Buttons
   ======================================== */

.btn-icon {
  padding: var(--spacing-3);
  min-width: 44px;
}

.btn-icon svg,
.btn-icon img {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
}

.btn-icon.btn-sm img {
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
}

.btn-icon.btn-lg svg,
.btn-icon.btn-lg img {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
}

/* Icon with text */
.btn svg:first-child,
.btn img:first-child {
  margin-right: var(--spacing-2);
}

.btn svg:last-child,
.btn img:last-child {
  margin-left: var(--spacing-2);
}

/* ========================================
   Button Group
   ======================================== */

.btn-group {
  display: inline-flex;
  gap: var(--spacing-2);
}

.btn-group .btn {
  flex: 1;
}

.btn-group-vertical {
  flex-direction: column;
}

/* Connected button group */
.btn-group-connected {
  gap: 0;
}

.btn-group-connected .btn {
  border-radius: 0;
}

.btn-group-connected .btn:first-child {
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg) 0 0 var(--radius-lg);
}

.btn-group-connected .btn:last-child {
  border-radius: 0 var(--radius-lg) var(--radius-lg) 0;
}

/* ========================================
   Touch Device Optimizations
   ======================================== */

@media (hover: none) and (pointer: coarse) {
  .btn {
    min-height: 48px;
    padding: var(--spacing-4) var(--spacing-6);
  }
  
  .btn:active {
    transform: scale(0.98);
  }
  
  .btn-sm {
    min-height: 44px;
    padding: var(--spacing-3) var(--spacing-5);
  }
}

/* ========================================
   Reduced Motion
   ======================================== */

@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  .btn {
    transition: none;
  }
  
  .btn-ripple::before {
    transition: none;
  }
  
  .btn-loading::after {
    animation: none;
  }
  
  .btn:hover {
    transform: none;
  }
}

   High Contrast Mode
   ======================================== */

@media (prefers-contrast: high) {
  .btn {
    border-width: 3px;
  }
  
  .btn:focus-visible {
    outline-width: 4px;
  }

 */

/* ========================================
   Base Card
   ======================================== */

.card {

}

   Property Card (BEM)
   ======================================== */

FILE: docs\design-system\DESIGN_PRINCIPLES\index.html
SIZE: 12,297 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-15 04:13:28
================================================================================
<h1>Design Principles - Properties 4 Creations</h1>
<h2>Overview</h2>
<p>This document outlines the design principles, visual language, and guidelines for the Properties 4 Creations housing platform serving <strong>families and veterans</strong> in East Texas. These principles ensure consistency, accessibility, and a professional user experience across all touchpoints.</p>
<hr>
<h2>Core Values</h2>
<h3>1. Family &amp; Veteran-First Design</h3>
<ul>
<li>Design with dignity, respect, and accessibility as primary concerns for all families and veterans</li>
<li>Use clear, straightforward language without jargon</li>
<li>Provide multiple pathways to complete tasks</li>
<li>Ensure all critical information is easily discoverable</li>
<li>Consider diverse family structures and needs</li>
<li>Honor veteran service while welcoming all eligible families</li>
</ul>
<h3>2. Transparency &amp; Trust</h3>
<ul>
<li>Clear information hierarchy with honest communication</li>
<li>No hidden fees, terms, or conditions</li>
<li>Progress indicators for multi-step processes</li>
<li>Consistent, predictable interface patterns</li>
</ul>
<h3>3. Accessibility (WCAG 2.2 AA)</h3>
<ul>
<li>Minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text</li>
<li>44x44px minimum touch targets</li>
<li>Full keyboard navigation support</li>
<li>Screen reader compatibility</li>
<li>Respect user preferences (reduced motion, color scheme)</li>
</ul>
<h3>4. Performance</h3>
<ul>
<li>Core Web Vitals compliance (LCP &lt;2.5s, FID &lt;100ms, CLS &lt;0.1)</li>
<li>Progressive enhancement approach</li>
<li>Offline-first PWA capabilities</li>
<li>Optimized images and assets</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>Visual Language</h2>
<h3>Color Palette</h3>
<h4>Primary Colors</h4>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Color</th>
<th>Hex</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>Navy</td>
<td><code>#0B1120</code></td>
<td>Brand, headers, CTAs, primary text</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Gold</td>
<td><code>#C28E5A</code></td>
<td>Accents, highlights, interactive elements</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Beige</td>
<td><code>#F5F5F0</code></td>
<td>Backgrounds, cards</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h4>Semantic Colors</h4>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Color</th>
<th>Hex</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>Error</td>
<td><code>#D32F2F</code></td>
<td>Error states, destructive actions</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Success</td>
<td><code>#388E3C</code></td>
<td>Success states, confirmations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Warning</td>
<td><code>#F57C00</code></td>
<td>Warnings, cautions</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Info</td>
<td><code>#1976D2</code></td>
<td>Informational messages</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h4>Neutral Colors</h4>
<ul>
<li>White (<code>#FFFFFF</code>) - Card backgrounds, text on dark</li>
<li>Gray scale (<code>#F9FAFB</code> to <code>#111827</code>) - Borders, secondary text, dividers</li>
<li>Black (<code>#000000</code>) - High contrast text when needed</li>
</ul>
<h3>Typography</h3>
<h4>Font Families</h4>
<ul>
<li><strong>Headings</strong>: Merriweather (serif) - Conveys trust and professionalism</li>
<li><strong>Body</strong>: System fonts (-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto) - Optimal readability</li>
<li><strong>Code</strong>: Monaco, Courier New (monospace) - Technical content</li>
</ul>
<h4>Type Scale</h4>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Name</th>
<th>Size</th>
<th>Line Height</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>xs</td>
<td>0.75rem (12px)</td>
<td>1rem</td>
<td>Captions, labels</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sm</td>
<td>0.875rem (14px)</td>
<td>1.25rem</td>
<td>Secondary text</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>base</td>
<td>1rem (16px)</td>
<td>1.5rem</td>
<td>Body text</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>lg</td>

<td>1.75rem</td>
<td>Lead paragraphs</td>
</tr>

</tr>

</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Spacing System</h3>
<p>Based on an 8px grid system for consistent rhythm:</p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Token</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>

<td>0.25rem (4px)</td>
<td>Tight spacing, icons</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-2</td>
<td>0.5rem (8px)</td>
<td>Inline elements</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-3</td>
<td>0.75rem (12px)</td>
<td>Small gaps</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-4</td>
<td>1rem (16px)</td>
<td>Standard spacing</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-6</td>
<td>1.5rem (24px)</td>
<td>Section padding</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-8</td>
<td>2rem (32px)</td>
<td>Large gaps</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-12</td>
<td>3rem (48px)</td>
<td>Section margins</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-16</td>
<td>4rem (64px)</td>
<td>Page sections</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

<table>

</tr>

</table>

<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Token</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>sm</td>
<td>0.125rem</td>
<td>Subtle rounding</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>base</td>

<td>Inputs, small elements</td>
</tr>
<tr>

</tr>
<tr>
<td>full</td>
<td>9999px</td>
<td>Pills, avatars</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<hr>
<h2>Component Guidelines</h2>
<h3>Buttons</h3>
<h4>Variants</h4>
<ol>
<li><strong>Primary</strong> - Main CTAs (gold background, navy text)</li>
<li><strong>Secondary</strong> - Secondary actions (navy outline)</li>
<li><strong>Tertiary</strong> - Low-emphasis actions (text only)</li>
<li><strong>Danger</strong> - Destructive actions (red)</li>
</ol>
<h4>States</h4>
<ul>
<li>Default, Hover, Active, Focus, Disabled, Loading</li>
</ul>
<h4>Sizing</h4>
<ul>
<li>Small: 36px height, 14px text</li>
<li>Medium: 44px height, 16px text (default)</li>
<li>Large: 52px height, 18px text</li>
</ul>
<h4>Rules</h4>
<ul>
<li>Always include visible focus indicator</li>
<li>Minimum 44x44px touch target</li>
<li>Use loading state for async actions</li>
<li>Include icon + text for important actions</li>
</ul>
<h3>Cards</h3>
<h4>Property Cards</h4>
<ul>
<li>Image with lazy loading</li>
<li>Title (H3)</li>
<li>Address</li>
<li>Features (beds, baths, sqft)</li>
<li>Tags (Section 8, HUD-VASH, Pet Friendly)</li>
<li>CTA button</li>
</ul>
<h4>Hover Effects</h4>
<ul>
<li>Subtle lift (translateY -4px)</li>
<li>Shadow increase</li>
<li>Image zoom (scale 1.05)</li>
</ul>
<h3>Forms</h3>
<h4>Input Fields</h4>
<ul>
<li>Clear labels above inputs</li>
<li>Placeholder text for examples only</li>
<li>Error messages below with icon</li>
<li>Success state on valid input</li>
<li>16px minimum font size (prevents iOS zoom)</li>
</ul>
<h4>Validation</h4>
<ul>
<li>Real-time validation on blur</li>
<li>Clear error messages with recovery path</li>
<li>Use aria-live for screen reader announcements</li>
</ul>
<h3>Navigation</h3>
<h4>Header</h4>
<ul>
<li>Sticky on scroll</li>
<li>Glass morphism effect</li>
<li>Mobile hamburger menu at 768px</li>
<li>Skip navigation link</li>
</ul>
<h4>Mobile Menu</h4>
<ul>
<li>Full-screen overlay</li>
<li>Focus trap when open</li>
<li>Close on Escape key</li>
<li>Animate from left</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>Motion Guidelines</h2>
<h3>Duration</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Token</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>instant</td>
<td>0ms</td>
<td>Immediate feedback</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>fast</td>
<td>150ms</td>
<td>Micro-interactions</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>base</td>
<td>250ms</td>
<td>Standard transitions</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>slow</td>
<td>350ms</td>
<td>Complex animations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>slower</td>
<td>500ms</td>
<td>Page transitions</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Easing</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Token</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>easeOut</td>
<td>cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.2, 1)</td>
<td>Enter animations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>easeIn</td>
<td>cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 1, 1)</td>
<td>Exit animations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>easeInOut</td>
<td>cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)</td>
<td>Move animations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>bounce</td>
<td>cubic-bezier(0.68, -0.55, 0.265, 1.55)</td>
<td>Playful feedback</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Reduced Motion</h3>
<p>Always respect <code>prefers-reduced-motion</code>:</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  * {
    animation-duration: 0.01ms !important;
    transition-duration: 0.01ms !important;
  }
}
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>Responsive Design</h2>
<h3>Breakpoints</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Name</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Target</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>xs</td>
<td>320px</td>
<td>Small phones</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sm</td>
<td>640px</td>
<td>Large phones</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>md</td>
<td>768px</td>
<td>Tablets</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>lg</td>
<td>1024px</td>
<td>Laptops</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>xl</td>
<td>1280px</td>
<td>Desktops</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>2xl</td>
<td>1536px</td>
<td>Large screens</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Mobile-First Approach</h3>
<p>Write base styles for mobile, then add complexity:</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">/* Mobile (default) */
.grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }

/* Tablet */
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); }
}

/* Desktop */
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr); }
}
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>Accessibility Checklist</h2>
<h3>Color &amp; Contrast</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] Text contrast ratio ≥ 4.5:1 (AA)</li>
<li>[ ] Large text contrast ratio ≥ 3:1</li>
<li>[ ] Non-text contrast ratio ≥ 3:1</li>
<li>[ ] Don't rely on color alone for meaning</li>
</ul>
<h3>Keyboard Navigation</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] All interactive elements focusable</li>
<li>[ ] Visible focus indicators</li>
<li>[ ] Logical tab order</li>
<li>[ ] Skip navigation link</li>
<li>[ ] Escape closes modals/menus</li>
</ul>
<h3>Screen Readers</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] Semantic HTML structure</li>
<li>[ ] Proper heading hierarchy (H1 → H2 → H3)</li>
<li>[ ] Alt text for images</li>
<li>[ ] ARIA labels for icons/buttons</li>
<li>[ ] Live regions for dynamic content</li>
</ul>
<h3>Forms</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] Labels associated with inputs</li>
<li>[ ] Error messages linked with aria-describedby</li>
<li>[ ] Required fields marked with aria-required</li>
<li>[ ] Form validation announced</li>
</ul>
<h3>Touch</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] 44x44px minimum touch targets</li>
<li>[ ] 8px minimum spacing between targets</li>
<li>[ ] No hover-only interactions</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>File Naming Conventions</h2>
<h3>Images</h3>
<pre><code>[type]-[location]-[description].[ext]
</code></pre>
<p>Examples:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>hero-home-banner.webp</code></li>
<li><code>properties-tyler-ranch-home.webp</code></li>
<li><code>icon-section-8.svg</code></li>
</ul>
<h3>CSS Classes (BEM)</h3>
<pre><code>.block__element--modifier
</code></pre>
<p>Examples:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>.property-card</code></li>
<li><code>.property-card__image</code></li>
<li><code>.property-card--featured</code></li>
</ul>
<h3>JavaScript</h3>
<pre><code>camelCase for variables/functions
PascalCase for classes
UPPER_SNAKE_CASE for constants
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>Version History</h2>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Version</th>
<th>Date</th>
<th>Changes</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>1.0.0</td>
<td>2025-12-15</td>
<td>Initial design system documentation</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<hr>

</ul>

        <!-- FAQ HEADER -->
        <section class="page-banner" style="background-image: url('public/images/banners/hero-home-banner.webp'); background-size: cover; background-position: center;">
            <div class="container">
                <h1>Frequently Asked Questions</h1>
                <p>Answers to common questions about our veteran housing services</p>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- FAQ SECTION -->
        <section class="faq-section">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="faq-container">
                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>How do I apply for housing with Properties 4 Creations?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>You can start your application by clicking the "Apply Now" button on any page or visiting our <a href="apply.html" style="color: var(--gold); font-weight: 600;">application page</a>. The process involves:</p>
                            <ol>
                                <li>Completing our online application form with your personal information</li>
                                <li>Providing details about your housing voucher and income</li>
                                <li>Allowing 24-48 hours for our team to review your application</li>
                                <li>Scheduling a property viewing if you're approved</li>
                                <li>Completing the lease signing process</li>
                            </ol>
                            <p>Our veteran team is here to guide you through each step.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>Do you accept Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p><strong>Yes, we accept 100% of Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers.</strong> We are committed to helping voucher holders find quality housing without discrimination. Here's what you need to know:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>We accept vouchers from any housing authority</li>
                                <li>No application fees or discriminatory screening</li>
                                <li>Properties are pre-inspected and Section 8 ready</li>
                                <li>Our team handles all voucher coordination with your housing authority</li>
                                <li>Transparent process with clear communication at every step</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>If you have questions about voucher acceptance, <a href="contact.html" style="color: var(--gold); font-weight: 600;">contact us directly</a>.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>What about HUD-VASH for veterans?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p><strong>We are fully HUD-VASH approved</strong> and actively partner with the VA to house veterans. As a veteran-owned company, we understand the unique needs of our fellow service members.</p>
                            <p>HUD-VASH benefits include:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Direct coordination with your VA case manager</li>
                                <li>Veterans receive priority consideration</li>
                                <li>Specialized veteran-friendly properties</li>
                                <li>Ongoing support during the transition to housing</li>
                                <li>Understanding of military culture and experiences</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>If you're working with the VA on housing, we can help streamline the process.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>What areas do you serve in East Texas?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>We serve communities across East Texas, focusing on areas with strong veteran populations and good access to services:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li><strong>Primary Markets:</strong> Tyler, Longview</li>
                                <li><strong>Secondary Markets:</strong> Marshall, Jefferson, Mineola, Kemp</li>
                                <li><strong>Surrounding Areas:</strong> Nacogdoches, Palestine, Kilgore, White Oak</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>Our properties are strategically located near:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>VA medical centers and outpatient clinics</li>
                                <li>Public transportation routes</li>
                                <li>Employment opportunities and job training centers</li>
                                <li>Schools and community services</li>
                                <li>Grocery stores and essential services</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>What makes Properties 4 Creations different from other landlords?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p><strong>We're veteran-owned and operated</strong>, which means we bring a unique understanding to housing for veterans and families. Here's what sets us apart:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li><strong>100% Voucher Acceptance:</strong> We welcome Section 8 and HUD-VASH without discrimination</li>
                                <li><strong>Premium Renovations:</strong> Every property meets our rigorous $30,000+ renovation standards</li>
                                <li><strong>Transparency:</strong> We publish our renovation standards and cost breakdowns</li>
                                <li><strong>Quality Guarantees:</strong> Comprehensive warranties on all systems</li>
                                <li><strong>Veteran Understanding:</strong> We understand military culture and challenges</li>
                                <li><strong>Community Focus:</strong> We're invested in rebuilding East Texas communities</li>
                                <li><strong>Fair Housing Compliance:</strong> Strict adherence to all anti-discrimination laws</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>Are all your properties recently renovated?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p><strong>Yes, every property undergoes comprehensive renovation</strong> before becoming available. Our renovation process includes:</p>
                            <h4>Core Systems (12-month warranties)</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Complete HVAC system replacement and certification</li>
                                <li>Full roof replacement with premium materials</li>
                                <li>New plumbing throughout with copper pipes</li>
                                <li>Modern electrical systems with code compliance</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>Interior Finishes (6-month warranties)</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Professional painting throughout</li>
                                <li>New or refinished flooring</li>
                                <li>Updated kitchens with new appliances</li>
                                <li>Modern bathrooms with new fixtures</li>
                                <li>Fresh fixtures and lighting</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>See our complete <a href="transparency.html" style="color: var(--gold); font-weight: 600;">renovation standards</a> for full details.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>How long does the application process take?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>The timeline varies based on your voucher status and property availability:</p>
                            <h4>For Applicants with Active Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li><strong>Application Review:</strong> 24-48 hours</li>
                                <li><strong>Document Verification:</strong> 1-3 business days</li>
                                <li><strong>Property Viewing:</strong> Same week if approved</li>
                                <li><strong>Lease Signing:</strong> Within 1-2 weeks</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>For Applicants Without Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li><strong>Application Review:</strong> 24-48 hours</li>
                                <li><strong>Voucher Guidance:</strong> We'll help connect you with local housing authorities</li>
                                <li><strong>Timeline:</strong> Depends on housing authority waitlist status</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>We'll keep you informed throughout the entire process.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>What if I don't have a housing voucher yet?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p><strong>We can help guide you through the voucher process.</strong> Here's how we assist applicants without vouchers:</p>
                            <h4>Section 8 Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Help you understand eligibility requirements</li>
                                <li>Connect you with local housing authorities</li>
                                <li>Guide you through application processes</li>
                                <li>Monitor waitlist openings</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>HUD-VASH for Veterans</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Coordinate with your VA case manager</li>
                                <li>Provide documentation of our veteran-friendly properties</li>
                                <li>Support the voucher application process</li>
                                <li>Expedite property matching once voucher is issued</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>Contact us to discuss your situation and we'll create a personalized plan.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>What are your income requirements?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>Income requirements vary by program and are set by the housing authorities, but generally:</p>
                            <h4>Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Typically 50% or below Area Median Income (AMI)</li>
                                <li>For East Texas (2025): Single person maximum ≈ $19,750/year</li>
                                <li>Four-person household maximum ≈ $28,200/year</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>HUD-VASH</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Usually 50% or below AMI</li>
                                <li>Special considerations for homeless veterans</li>
                                <li>Case-by-case evaluation for extreme circumstances</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>We can help you determine if you meet current income requirements for your area.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>Do you accommodate families with children?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p><strong>Absolutely. We welcome families of all sizes.</strong> Our properties include:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>2, 3, and 4-bedroom homes for larger families</li>
                                <li>Properties near quality schools and family services</li>
                                <li>Safe neighborhoods with family amenities</li>
                                <li>Yard space and family-friendly layouts</li>
                                <li>Proximity to pediatric healthcare and family services</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>We understand the importance of stable housing for children's development and academic success.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>What if I have a disability and need accessibility features?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p><strong>We provide reasonable accommodations and accessibility modifications.</strong> Our accessibility commitment includes:</p>
                            <h4>Existing Features</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Wide doorways in common areas</li>
                                <li>Ground-floor units available</li>
                                <li>Step-free entrances where possible</li>
                                <li>Accessible bathroom features</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>Available Modifications</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Ramp installations</li>
                                <li>Grab bar additions</li>
                                <li>Accessible shower conversions</li>
                                <li>Visual alert systems</li>
                                <li>Other reasonable modifications as needed</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>Contact us to discuss your specific accessibility needs. We work with each applicant individually.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>Can I bring my service animal or pet?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p><strong>We accommodate service animals and have pet-friendly policies.</strong></p>
                            <h4>Service Animals</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Always welcome, no restrictions</li>
                                <li>Must meet ADA requirements</li>
                                <li>No additional fees for service animals</li>
                                <li>Reasonable accommodations for training needs</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>Pets</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Many properties are pet-friendly</li>
                                <li>Breed and size restrictions may apply</li>
                                <li>Pet deposits and fees may apply</li>
                                <li>Additional screening for pet compatibility</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>Contact us about specific pet policies for individual properties.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>What happens after I move in?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>Our relationship doesn't end at move-in. We provide ongoing support:</p>
                            <h4>First 30 Days</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Check-in call to ensure everything is working properly</li>
                                <li>Warranty support for any issues</li>
                                <li>Community integration assistance</li>
                                <li>VA or housing authority coordination as needed</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>Ongoing Support</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Maintenance support through our preferred vendors</li>
                                <li>Annual property inspections as required by programs</li>
                                <li>Renewal assistance for voucher holders</li>
                                <li>Emergency contact availability</li>
                                <li>Community building events and veteran support groups</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>How can I contact Properties 4 Creations?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>We're here to help! Contact us through:</p>
                            <div style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr)); gap: 1rem; margin: 1rem 0;">
                                <div style="background: white; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 8px; border-left: 4px solid var(--gold);">
                                    <h5><i data-lucide="phone"></i> Phone</h5>
                                    <p><a href="tel:+19035551234" style="color: var(--gold); font-weight: 600;">(903) 555-1234</a></p>
                                    <p>Mon-Fri: 9AM-5PM<br>Sat: 10AM-2PM</p>
                                </div>
                                <div style="background: white; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 8px; border-left: 4px solid var(--gold);">
                                    <h5><i data-lucide="mail"></i> Email</h5>
                                    <p><a href="mailto:info@properties4creations.com" style="color: var(--gold); font-weight: 600;">info@properties4creations.com</a></p>
                                    <p>Response within 24 hours</p>
                                </div>
                                <div style="background: white; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 8px; border-left: 4px solid var(--gold);">
                                    <h5><i data-lucide="map-pin"></i> Service Area</h5>
                                    <p>Tyler & Longview<br>East Texas</p>
                                    <p>In-person meetings by appointment</p>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <p>For urgent housing emergencies, call our main number and select the emergency option.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

    <script src="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest/dist/umd/lucide.js" integrity="sha384-sha384-XcPm71GSOvViJoCA7WCb/9rSD/M3VBABxIZH30y7wbDtwRymtm2Dw2NTumuGrJqB" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    <script>
        lucide.createIcons();

    <script src="public/js/main.js"></script>

    <script>
        // FAQ TOGGLE FUNCTIONALITY
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const faqItems = document.querySelectorAll('.faq-item');
            
            faqItems.forEach(item => {
                const question = item.querySelector('.faq-question');
                const answer = item.querySelector('.faq-answer');
                const icon = item.querySelector('.faq-icon');
                
                question.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    const isActive = item.classList.contains('active');
                    
                    // Close all other items
                    faqItems.forEach(otherItem => {
                        if (otherItem !== item) {
                            otherItem.classList.remove('active');
                            const otherAnswer = otherItem.querySelector('.faq-answer');
                            const otherIcon = otherItem.querySelector('.faq-icon');
                            otherAnswer.style.maxHeight = '0';
                            otherAnswer.style.padding = '0';
                            otherIcon.style.transform = 'rotate(0deg)';
                        }
                    });
                    
                    // Toggle current item
                    if (isActive) {
                        item.classList.remove('active');
                        answer.style.maxHeight = '0';
                        answer.style.padding = '0';
                        icon.style.transform = 'rotate(0deg)';
                    } else {
                        item.classList.add('active');
                        answer.style.maxHeight = answer.scrollHeight + 'px';
                        answer.style.padding = '1.5rem';
                        icon.style.transform = 'rotate(180deg)';
                    }
                });
                
                // Initialize all answers as closed
                answer.style.maxHeight = '0';
                answer.style.padding = '0';
                answer.style.overflow = 'hidden';
                answer.style.transition = 'all 0.3s ease';
                icon.style.transition = 'transform 0.3s ease';
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

    <script>
        // MAP INITIALIZATION
        if (document.getElementById('map')) {
            const script = document.createElement('script');
            script.src = 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/leaflet@1.9.4/dist/leaflet.js';
            script.integrity = 'sha256-20nQCchB9co0qIjJZRGuk2/Z9VM+kNiyxNV1lvTlZBo=';
            script.crossOrigin = 'anonymous';
            script.onload = () => {
                const map = L.map('map').setView([32.35, -95.3], 10);
                L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', {
                    attribution: '© OpenStreetMap contributors',
                    maxZoom: 19
                }).addTo(map);

                L.marker([32.351, -95.301], {
                    title: 'Tyler Properties'
                }).addTo(map).bindPopup('<b>Tyler, TX</b><br>Multiple Properties Available');

                L.marker([32.50, -94.74], {
                    title: 'Longview Properties'
                }).addTo(map).bindPopup('<b>Longview, TX</b><br>Multiple Properties Available');
            };
            document.head.appendChild(script);
        }
    </script>

                    <p class="property-location"><i data-lucide="map-pin"></i> Jefferson, TX</p>
                    <div class="property-highlights">

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <section class="property-features">
            <div class="container">
                <h2>Serene Waterfront Living</h2>

                        <p>Breathtaking views of Big Cypress Bayou from every window</p>
                    </div>

                        <div class="feature-icon"><i data-lucide="accessibility"></i></div>
                        <h3>ADA Accessible</h3>
                        <p>Ground floor unit with zero-step entry and wide doorways</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="feature-card">
                        <div class="feature-icon"><i data-lucide="shield-check"></i></div>
                        <h3>Modern Security</h3>
                        <p>Secure building with intercom entry system</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <section class="application-cta">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="cta-content">
                    <h2>Experience Peaceful Riverfront Living</h2>
                    <p>This beautiful ADA-accessible apartment with stunning water views is Section 8 approved. Perfect for families seeking tranquility near nature.</p>
                    <div class="cta-buttons">
                        <a href="apply.html" class="btn btn-primary">Apply for This Home</a>
                        <a href="properties.html" class="btn btn-secondary">View Other Properties</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>
    </main>

    <footer class="footer">

                    <h3>Properties 4 Creations</h3>
                    <p>Building homes, rebuilding lives in East Texas.</p>

                </div>
                <div class="footer-section">
                    <h4>Quick Links</h4>
                    <ul>
                        <li><a href="index.html">Home</a></li>
                        <li><a href="properties.html">Properties</a></li>

                    </ul>

            </div>
